name: Nexans
memberOrga: EUROPACABLE, AFEP, AEIC, AFNOR, ASD-STAN, CENELEC, CIGRE, DKE, GIMELEC, ICC, ICEA, IEC, IEEE, ISO, JIS, NEK, NFPA, ODVA, SYCABEL, TIA, ZVEI
goal: Nexans brings energy to life through an extensive range of cables and cabling solutions that deliver increased performance for our customers worldwide. Nexans’ teams are committed to a partnership approach that supports customers in four main business areas: Power transmission and distribution (submarine and land), Energy resources (Oil & Gas, Mining and Renewables), Transportation (Road, Rail, Air, Sea) and Building (Commercial, Residential and Data Centers). Nexans’ strategy is founded on continuous innovation in products, solutions and services, employee development, customer training and the introduction of safe, low-environmental-impact industrial processes
euInitiatives: Nexans follows initiatives related to cables, in particular to renewable energy and safety. Nexans also follows technical issues relating for example  to governance, social, fiscal issues.
